3: I'll get this done as soon as possible. Then I'll be outta your hair!
I've been coming here way too often recently.
They aren't botching the turret again, are they?!
(Whirling noise) — Turret has resumed normal operation.
Gotta hand it to the commandant and Karenina for saving me. If the turret blasted a hole in the base's wall, we would've been goners.
Yeah, good thing the commandant and Karenina arrived in the nick of time.

2: Karenina did most of the work.

3: ...No need... No need... to thank me...
Anyway! I'll handle the rest from here...
Karenina is just as bold and brazen on the battlefield.

4: Is this how the engineering force gets the job done?

3: You could say that. After all, we're around them all the time.
Flattery won't make me step on the gas! Quit distracting me from my work!
